store_url.title: Store URL
store_url.description: Your shop domain name, e.g. https://myshop.com

#consumer_key.title: Consumer Key
#consumer_key.description: Rest API Consumer Key from Woocommerce Admin panel

#consumer_secret.title: Consumer secret
#consumer_secret.description: Rest API Consumer Secret from Woocommerce Admin panel

incremental_output.title: Load type
incremental_output.description: If set to Incremental update, the result tables will be updated based on primary key. Full load overwrites the destination table each time. NOTE: If you wish to remove deleted records, this needs to be set to Full load and the Period from attribute empty.

date_from.title: From date [inclusive]
date_from.description: Date from. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or a string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. If left empty, all records are downloaded.

date_to.title: To date [exclusive]
date_to.description: Date to. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or a string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. If left empty, all records are downloaded.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: To fetch data from specific endpoints i.e. Customers, Orders and Products. Default selection is all
